019package com.plotsquared.core.command;
020
021import com.google.inject.Inject;
022import com.plotsquared.core.PlotSquared;
023import com.plotsquared.core.configuration.Settings;
024import com.plotsquared.core.configuration.caption.TranslatableCaption;
025import com.plotsquared.core.events.TeleportCause;
026import com.plotsquared.core.permissions.Permission;
027import com.plotsquared.core.player.PlotPlayer;
028import com.plotsquared.core.plot.Plot;
029import com.plotsquared.core.plot.PlotArea;
030import com.plotsquared.core.plot.flag.implementations.UntrustedVisitFlag;
031import com.plotsquared.core.plot.world.PlotAreaManager;
032import com.plotsquared.core.util.MathMan;
033import com.plotsquared.core.util.Permissions;
034import com.plotsquared.core.util.PlayerManager;
035import com.plotsquared.core.util.TabCompletions;
036import com.plotsquared.core.util.query.PlotQuery;
037import com.plotsquared.core.util.query.SortingStrategy;
038import com.plotsquared.core.util.task.RunnableVal2;
039import com.plotsquared.core.util.task.RunnableVal3;
040import net.kyori.adventure.text.Component;
041import net.kyori.adventure.text.minimessage.tag.Tag;
042import net.kyori.adventure.text.minimessage.tag.resolver.TagResolver;
043import org.checkerframework.checker.nullness.qual.NonNull;
044
045import java.util.ArrayList;
046import java.util.Collection;
047import java.util.Collections;
048import java.util.List;
049import java.util.UUID;
050import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
051import java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException;
052
053@CommandDeclaration(command = "visit",
054        permission = "plots.visit",
055        usage = "/plot visit <player> | <alias> | <plot> [area]|[#] [#]",
056        aliases = {"v", "tp", "teleport", "goto", "warp"},
057        requiredType = RequiredType.PLAYER,
058        category = CommandCategory.TELEPORT)
059public class Visit extends Command {
060
061    private final PlotAreaManager plotAreaManager;
062
063    @Inject
064    public Visit(final @NonNull PlotAreaManager plotAreaManager) {
065        super(MainCommand.getInstance(), true);
066        this.plotAreaManager = plotAreaManager;
067    }
068
069    private void visit(
070            final @NonNull PlotPlayer<?> player, final @NonNull PlotQuery query, final PlotArea sortByArea,
071            final RunnableVal3<Command, Runnable, Runnable> confirm, final RunnableVal2<Command, CommandResult> whenDone, int page
072    ) {
073        // We get the query once,
074        // then we get it another time further on
075        final List<Plot> unsorted = query.asList();
076
077        if (unsorted.size() > 1) {
078            query.whereBasePlot();
079        }
080
081        if (page == Integer.MIN_VALUE) {
082            page = 1;
083        }
084
085        PlotArea relativeArea = sortByArea;
086        if (Settings.Teleport.PER_WORLD_VISIT && sortByArea == null) {
087            relativeArea = player.getApplicablePlotArea();
088        }
089
090        if (relativeArea != null) {
091            query.relativeToArea(relativeArea).withSortingStrategy(SortingStrategy.SORT_BY_CREATION);
092        } else {
093            query.withSortingStrategy(SortingStrategy.SORT_BY_TEMP);
094        }
095
096        final List<Plot> plots = query.asList();
097
098        if (plots.isEmpty()) {
099            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("invalid.found_no_plots"));
100            return;
101        } else if (plots.size() < page || page < 1) {
102            player.sendMessage(
103                    TranslatableCaption.of("invalid.number_not_in_range"),
104                    TagResolver.builder()
105                            .tag("min", Tag.inserting(Component.text(1)))
106                            .tag("max", Tag.inserting(Component.text(plots.size())))
107                            .build()
108            );
109            return;
110        }
111
112        final Plot plot = plots.get(page - 1);
113        if (!plot.hasOwner()) {
114            if (!Permissions.hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_VISIT_UNOWNED)) {
115                player.sendMessage(
116                        TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission"),
117                        TagResolver.resolver("node", Tag.inserting(Component.text("plots.visit.unowned")))
118                );
119                return;
120            }
121        } else if (plot.isOwner(player.getUUID())) {
122            if (!Permissions.hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_VISIT_OWNED) && !Permissions
123                    .hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_HOME)) {
124                player.sendMessage(
125                        TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission"),
126                        TagResolver.resolver("node", Tag.inserting(Component.text("plots.visit.owned")))
127                );
128                return;
129            }
130        } else if (plot.isAdded(player.getUUID())) {
131            if (!Permissions.hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_SHARED)) {
132                player.sendMessage(
133                        TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission"),
134                        TagResolver.resolver("node", Tag.inserting(Component.text("plots.visit.shared")))
135                );
136                return;
137            }
138        } else {
139            // allow visit, if UntrustedVisit flag is set, or if the player has either the plot.visit.other or
140            // plot.admin.visit.untrusted permission
141            if (!plot.getFlag(UntrustedVisitFlag.class) && !Permissions.hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_VISIT_OTHER)
142                    && !Permissions.hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_VISIT_UNTRUSTED)) {
143                player.sendMessage(
144                        TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission"),
145                        TagResolver.resolver("node", Tag.inserting(Component.text("plots.visit.other")))
146                );
147                return;
148            }
149            if (plot.isDenied(player.getUUID())) {
150                if (!Permissions.hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_VISIT_DENIED)) {
151                    player.sendMessage(
152                            TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission"),
153                            TagResolver.resolver(
154                                    "node",
155                                    Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_VISIT_DENIED)
156                            )
157                    );
158                    return;
159                }
160            }
161        }
162
163        confirm.run(this, () -> plot.teleportPlayer(player, TeleportCause.COMMAND_VISIT, result -> {
164            if (result) {
165                whenDone.run(Visit.this, CommandResult.SUCCESS);
166            } else {
167                whenDone.run(Visit.this, CommandResult.FAILURE);
168            }
169        }), () -> whenDone.run(Visit.this, CommandResult.FAILURE));
170    }
171
172    @Override
173    public CompletableFuture<Boolean> execute(
174            final PlotPlayer<?> player,
175            String[] args,
176            final RunnableVal3<Command, Runnable, Runnable> confirm,
177            final RunnableVal2<Command, CommandResult> whenDone
178    ) throws CommandException {
179        if (args.length > 3) {
180            sendUsage(player);
181            return CompletableFuture.completedFuture(false);
182        }
183
184        if (args.length == 1 && args[0].contains(":")) {
185            args = args[0].split(":");
186        }
187
188        PlotArea sortByArea;
189
190        int page = Integer.MIN_VALUE;
191
192        switch (args.length) {
193            // /p v <user> <area> <page>
194            case 3:
195                if (!MathMan.isInteger(args[2])) {
196                    player.sendMessage(
197                            TranslatableCaption.of("invalid.not_valid_number"),
198                            TagResolver.resolver("value", Tag.inserting(Component.text("(1, ∞)")))
199                    );
200                    player.sendMessage(
201                            TranslatableCaption.of("commandconfig.command_syntax"),
202                            TagResolver.resolver("value", Tag.inserting(Component.text(getUsage())))
203                    );
204                    return CompletableFuture.completedFuture(false);
205                }
206                page = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
207                // /p v <name> <area> [page]
208                // /p v <name> [page]
209            case 2:
210                if (page != Integer.MIN_VALUE || !MathMan.isInteger(args[1])) {
211                    sortByArea = this.plotAreaManager.getPlotAreaByString(args[1]);
212                    if (sortByArea == null) {
213                        player.sendMessage(
214                                TranslatableCaption.of("invalid.not_valid_number"),
215                                TagResolver.resolver("value", Tag.inserting(Component.text("(1, ∞)")))
216                        );
217                        player.sendMessage(
218                                TranslatableCaption.of("commandconfig.command_syntax"),
219                                TagResolver.resolver("value", Tag.inserting(Component.text(getUsage())))
220                        );
221                        return CompletableFuture.completedFuture(false);
222                    }
223
224                    final PlotArea finalSortByArea = sortByArea;
225                    int finalPage1 = page;
226                    PlayerManager.getUUIDsFromString(args[0], (uuids, throwable) -> {
227                        if (throwable instanceof TimeoutException) {
228                            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("players.fetching_players_timeout"));
229                        } else if (throwable != null || uuids.size() != 1) {
230                            player.sendMessage(
231                                    TranslatableCaption.of("commandconfig.command_syntax"),
232                                    TagResolver.resolver("value", Tag.inserting(Component.text(getUsage())))
233                            );
234                        } else {
235                            final UUID uuid = uuids.toArray(new UUID[0])[0];
236                            PlotQuery query = PlotQuery.newQuery();
237                            if (Settings.Teleport.VISIT_MERGED_OWNERS) {
238                                query.whereBasePlot().ownersInclude(uuid);
239                            } else {
240                                query.whereBasePlot().ownedBy(uuid);
241                            }
242                            this.visit(
243                                    player,
244                                    query,
245                                    finalSortByArea,
246                                    confirm,
247                                    whenDone,
248                                    finalPage1
249                            );
250                        }
251                    });
252                    break;
253                }
254                try {
255                    page = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
256                } catch (NumberFormatException ignored) {
257                    player.sendMessage(
258                            TranslatableCaption.of("invalid.not_a_number"),
259                            TagResolver.resolver("value", Tag.inserting(Component.text(args[1])))
260                    );
261                    return CompletableFuture.completedFuture(false);
262                }
263                // /p v <name> [page]
264                // /p v <uuid> [page]
265                // /p v <plot> [page]
266                // /p v <alias>
267            case 1:
268                final String[] finalArgs = args;
269                int finalPage = page;
270                if (args[0].length() >= 2 && !args[0].contains(";") && !args[0].contains(",")) {
271                    PlotSquared.get().getImpromptuUUIDPipeline().getSingle(args[0], (uuid, throwable) -> {
272                        if (throwable instanceof TimeoutException) {
273                            // The request timed out
274                            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("players.fetching_players_timeout"));
275                        } else if (uuid != null && (Settings.Teleport.VISIT_MERGED_OWNERS
276                                ? !PlotQuery.newQuery().ownersInclude(uuid).anyMatch()
277                                : !PlotQuery.newQuery().ownedBy(uuid).anyMatch())) {
278                            // It was a valid UUID but the player has no plots
279                            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("errors.player_no_plots"));
280                        } else if (uuid == null) {
281                            // player not found, so we assume it's an alias if no page was provided
282                            if (finalPage == Integer.MIN_VALUE) {
283                                this.visit(
284                                        player,
285                                        PlotQuery.newQuery().withAlias(finalArgs[0]),
286                                        player.getApplicablePlotArea(),
287                                        confirm,
288                                        whenDone,
289                                        1
290                                );
291                            } else {
292                                player.sendMessage(
293                                        TranslatableCaption.of("errors.invalid_player"),
294                                        TagResolver.resolver("value", Tag.inserting(Component.text(finalArgs[0])))
295                                );
296                            }
297                        } else {
298                            this.visit(
299                                    player,
300                                    Settings.Teleport.VISIT_MERGED_OWNERS
301                                            ? PlotQuery.newQuery().ownersInclude(uuid).whereBasePlot()
302                                            : PlotQuery.newQuery().ownedBy(uuid).whereBasePlot(),
303                                    null,
304                                    confirm,
305                                    whenDone,
306                                    finalPage
307                            );
308                        }
309                    });
310                } else {
311                    // Try to parse a plot
312                    final Plot plot = Plot.getPlotFromString(player, finalArgs[0], true);
313                    if (plot != null) {
314                        this.visit(player, PlotQuery.newQuery().withPlot(plot), null, confirm, whenDone, 1);
315                    }
316                }
317                break;
318            case 0:
319                // /p v is invalid
320                player.sendMessage(
321                        TranslatableCaption.of("commandconfig.command_syntax"),
322                        TagResolver.resolver("value", Tag.inserting(Component.text(getUsage())))
323                );
324                return CompletableFuture.completedFuture(false);
325            default:
326        }
327
328        return CompletableFuture.completedFuture(true);
329    }
330
331    @Override
332    public Collection<Command> tab(PlotPlayer<?> player, String[] args, boolean space) {
333        final List<Command> completions = new ArrayList<>();
334        switch (args.length - 1) {
335            case 0 -> completions.addAll(TabCompletions.completePlayers(player, args[0], Collections.emptyList()));
336            case 1 -> {
337                completions.addAll(
338                        TabCompletions.completeAreas(args[1]));
339                if (args[1].isEmpty()) {
340                    // if no input is given, only suggest 1 - 3
341                    completions.addAll(
342                            TabCompletions.asCompletions("1", "2", "3"));
343                    break;
344                }
345                completions.addAll(
346                        TabCompletions.completeNumbers(args[1], 10, 999));
347            }
348            case 2 -> {
349                if (args[2].isEmpty()) {
350                    // if no input is given, only suggest 1 - 3
351                    completions.addAll(
352                            TabCompletions.asCompletions("1", "2", "3"));
353                    break;
354                }
355                completions.addAll(
356                        TabCompletions.completeNumbers(args[2], 10, 999));
357            }
358        }
359
360        return completions;
361    }
362
363}
